definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: We dont accept parcels sealed with Scotch tape.
sentences.chinese: 我们不接受用透明胶封口的包裹。

sentences.english: It forms a clear gel which will not retrograde on stand.
sentences.chinese: 形成一种透明胶，静置时该胶不会退化。

sentences.english: The clear plastic reservoir makes it easy to monitor seed levels.
sentences.chinese: 透明胶水库可以方便地监测种子水平。

sentences.english: Copy to the watercolor paper and stick it to the drawing board with sellotape .
sentences.chinese: 拷贝到水彩纸上的线稿并用透明胶纸固定在画板上。

sentences.english: I also wrapped tape around the back of the handle to hold the paper down.
sentences.chinese: 我还用透明胶绕了把手一圈，好让纸贴着把手。

sentences.english: Gift baskets are wrapped using cellophane as well as some scotch tape to close the sides.
sentences.chinese: 礼篮包装用玻璃纸，以及一些透明胶带关闭两侧。

sentences.english: Oxyurid ova were examined for children younger than 12 by cellophane anal swab.
sentences.chinese: 透明胶纸肛拭法查12岁以下儿童蛲虫卵。

sentences.english: The compound semiconductor bare chips are coated by the transparent adhesive.
sentences.chinese: 透明胶材包覆所述多个化合物半导体裸片。

sentences.english: This knob is only held on by sellotape.
sentences.chinese: 这个旋钮只是用透明胶带固定住的。

sentences.english: Methods Part of school students were given a sample survey by transparent tape method.
sentences.chinese: 方法透明胶纸法对部分在校学生进行抽样调查。

sentences.english: A study on examining demodex mite in 669 cases was performed with a cellophane tape method.
sentences.chinese: 运用透明胶纸法对669人进行蠕形螨检查。

sentences.english: At home, she covered both sides of the photo with strips of transparent tape to keep it safe.
sentences.chinese: 回到家，她把照片的四边用透明胶带包好，以防磨损。

sentences.english: A large clear plastic bottle off of which you can cut the top.
sentences.chinese: 大型透明胶瓶起飞的，你可削减顶部。
